text: Lauren MacMullan (born April 30, 1964) is an American animation director. She works at Walt Disney Animation Studios. == Biography == As a child, Lauren MacMullan lived near Philadelphia. She graduated from Swarthmore High School in 1982. Then she studied in Harvard University. Her first primetime TV job was on The Critic, followed by directing for King of the Hill. She went on to become the supervising director and designer for Mission Hill. After the show was cancelled quickly, she got a job directing on The Simpsons, and stayed for three seasons. She also has directed some episodes of Avatar: The Last Airbender, and won an Annie award for storyboarding on that show. MacMullan was a sequence director on The Simpsons Movie. ==Other websites== * *Interview with Springfield Weekly Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Entertainers from London Category:Annie Award winners
title: Lauren MacMullan
